column17:
These Enamor pyjamas are a blend of style and comfort which make them perfect for a casual day out or gymming sessions. Cropped around mid calf these pyjamas are crafted in a straight fit which perfectly skim your natural contours. You can pair these pyjamas with a trendy top or tee for a chic look. Features
Usage : Everyday
Colour : Black Fit : Straight Pattern : Solid Waist : Elasticized Material : CottonWash and Care
It is recommended to wash your pyjamas with a mild detergent.
If washing in a machine set it on a delicate mode and low temperature cycle.
Wash dark colours separately and use iron at low temperature.
